III. PERSONAL SKILLS:    
PC Skills:  
 Excellent in Internet, Email, MS office, servers, OS… 
Language Skills: TOEIC 705. 
 I use English to communicate with foreign colleagues, customers and report to Project         
Manager every day. 
Working skills:   
• I am a hard-working, independent, easily adapt and dedicated worker. I enjoy 
working as a team. 
• Honest, careful and responsible. I can make friend easily with people of all ages and 
backgrounds. 
• I have knowledge of many kinds of ICT equipment of various brands. 
• I can configure, operate and maintain many kinds of ICT equipment. 
IV. JOB HISTORY:  
• HarveyNash Vietnam 
Company 
Job title 
From year to year 
Name & Title of Direct Manager 
Harvey Nash 
Vietnam 
Senior DevOps 
engineer 
August 2017 till 
now 
Mr. Long.Pham 
Company Description: 
Harvey Nash Vietnam is part of Harvey Nash Group, an 
outsourcing companies, a trusted advisor to over half of the 
world’s leading businesses, governments and institutions with 
over 7000 staff in more than 40 offices around the world.. 
Achievements: 
• Working skill improved. 
• Manage work better. 
Main duties :  
I am working as Senior DevOps Engineer for Kaplan Project. 
My roles: 
• Design Kubernetes multi-region cluster infrastructure for 
Microservice Application. 
• Configure, administrate Jenkins, Bitbucket CI, Gitlab CI 
for application deployment. 
• Implement, configure and administrate Nagios, New 
Relic, NodePing monitoring system. 
• Configure and administrate AWS services: EC2, RDS, 
Cloudformation, ELB, Cloudfront/CloudFlare... 
• Using Puppet to manage configuration of all stacks on 
AWS. 
• Research new system techniques/tools to improve 
productivity of DevOps team. 
• Support development team to troubleshot and resolve 
system problems. 
• Setup technical environment for development team. 
• Setup components for automation testing and 
performance testing. 
• FeelSyncSystem .Ltd 
Company 
Job title 
From year to year 
Name & Title of Direct Manager 
FeelSyncSystem .Ltd 
 DevOps engineer 
August 2016  
Mr. Taneichi  
Company Description: 
FeelSyncSystem is a Japanese company working in Website 
solution for Japanese customer. 
It provides the Online training, website crawler solutions. 
Achievements: 
• Working skill improved. 
• Manage work better. 
•   Learn the Japanese working 
discipline and styles. 
Main duties :  
• Design and propose the infrastructure for AWS project 
according to Customer's requirements. 
• Operate, maintain and monitor the related AWS services 
in projects. 
• Using Ansible + Ansistrano, Jenkins, Vagrant, Gitlab, 
Kubernetes, Docker, Bash scripts to automate all of the 
things: Development, Test & Production Environments. 
• Using Nagios, New Relic to monitor the infrastructure. 
• Implement solutions to reduce cloud spending. 
• Working in an environment with Security/Compliance 
tasks 
• Experience in MySQL, Nginx, Apache, PHP, Linux… 
• Troubleshoot the related technical issues. 
• DEFIDE .INC 
Company 
Job title 
From year to year 
Name & Title of Direct Manager 
DEFIDE .INC 
 DevOps engineer 
February 2015 to 
August 2016 
Mr. Duy.Vo  
Company Description: 
Defide is a Japanese company with 3 sites in Tokyo, Fukuoka 
and Saigon. 
It provides the ICT consulting services, Web marketing, Data 
analytics, Communication design… 
Achievements: 
• Working skill improved. 
• Manage work better. 
•   Learn the Japanese working 
discipline and styles. 
Main duties :  
• Collect customer’s requirement and design the AWS 
infrastructure. 
• Implement, manage and monitor Amazon AWS (VPC, 
EC2, ELB, RDS, S3, Lambda, SQS, ElasticSearch, 
Route53, EMR, Beanstalk, Docker…) services for 
customer. 
• Migrate on-premise MySQL database to Amazon RDS. 
• Automate system operation and backup data on Amazon 
AWS using bash scripts. 
• Build and import virtual server from on-premise to 
Amazon. 
• Using Amazon ElasticSearch to analyze application log. 
• Using Amazon CloudFormation to backup AWS 
resources. 
• Manage services on Windows Domain 2012: DC, DNS, 
DHCP, File server, Office 365. 
• Troubleshoot the related technical issues. 
• CHUNGHWA TELECOM VIETNAM  
Company 
Job title 
From year to year 
Name & Title of Direct Manager 
Chunghwa Telecom 
Vietnam(CHTVN) 
Project engineer 
15th  Oct 2011 to 
2015 
Mr Enos – Project Manager 
Company Description: 
CHTVN  is a member of CHT Taiwan. 
It provides the ICT services for Taiwan customers in 3 countries: 
Vietnam, Laos and Cambodia. 
Achievements: 
• Working skill improved. 
• Manage work better. 
• Understand more about the ICT 
Project’s business. 
• I was sent to Taiwan for training 
in 2013 based on my outstanding 
achievement. 
Main duties :  
• Collect the customer’s requirement and propose the 
appropriate solution and make presentation. 
• Make plan for project, follow project’s schedule, and 
manage project’s quality.  
• Experienced in managing services on Windows Domain 
2012: DC, DNS, DHCP, File server, WSUS, Exchange 
2013. 
• Experienced in deploying and managing Vmware 
Vsphere 5.5/6 with VEEAM backup solution. 
• Support Amazon AWS (EC2, ELB, RDS, S3, Route53) 
services for customer. 
• I have knowledge about Microsoft Azure. 
• Configure Server (Dell Power Edge 2970, IBM X3650 
series, IBM 3200, HP Proliant DL380 Gen8). 
• Take part in projects outside Vietnam including 
Cambodia, India, Taiwan. 
You can refer my Certificates on this link: 
https://www.dropbox.com/s/rdv7ontfoabnmtv/certificates.pdf 
By my signature, I certify that, to the best of my knowledge, the information provided in 
this resume is accurate and complete.  
Applicant's signature 
NGUYEN VU NINH
